devdoc.author: David Yongjun Kim (@Powerstream3604)
devdoc.details: Contract to easily deploy Barz to a pre-computed address with a single call

params._accountFacet: Account Facet to be used to create Barz
params._defaultFallback: Default Fallback Handler to be used to create Barz
params._entryPoint: Entrypoint contract to be used to create Barz. This uses canonical EntryPoint deployed by EF
params._facetRegistry: Facet Registry to be used to create Barz

params._owner: Public Key of the owner to initialize barz account
params._salt: Salt used for deploying barz with create2
params._verificationFacet: Address of verification facet used for creating the barz account

returns.barz: Instance of Barz contract deployed with the given parameters

params._owner: Public Key of the owner to initialize barz account
params._salt: Salt used for deploying barz with create2
params._verificationFacet: Address of verification facet used for creating the barz account

params._accountFacet: Account Facet to be used to create Barz
params._defaultFallback: Default Fallback Handler to be used to create Barz
params._entryPoint: Entrypoint contract to be used to create Barz. This uses canonical EntryPoint deployed by EF
params._facetRegistry: Facet Registry to be used to create Barz
params._ownerPublicKey: Public Key of owner to be used to initialize Barz ownership
params._verificationFacet: Verification Facet to be used to create Barz

devdoc.title: Barz Factory

constructor.notice: Sets the initialization data for Barz contract initialization

createAccount(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Creates the Barz with a single call. It creates the Barz contract with the givent verification facet

getAddress(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Calculates the address of Barz with the given parameters

getBytecode(address,address,address,addr.notice: Returns the bytecode of Barz with the given parameter

getCreationCode().notice: Returns the creation code of the Barz contract
